about.title: About me
about.caption: Pragmatic frontend, product experience, and tooling that scales with the team.
summary: I am a frontend engineer with over ten years of experience across scale-ups and enterprise products. I love bringing order to interfaces, creating design systems that stay out of the way, and orchestrating pipelines that make designers and developers happy.
In recent years I have enabled cross-functional teams on AI-driven products, curating DX, code quality, and automations that deliver production value without stress.

experience.title: Experience
experience.caption: Products launched with distributed teams, design systems, and an obsession for DX.

roles.summary: I lead the implementation of the modular design system and the front-end toolchain for enterprise platforms.
highlights: I re-engineered the React 18 design system with cross-brand tokens and automated visual regression.
I introduced Nx + Vite, cutting build times by 40% and simplifying team contribution.

roles.summary: I coordinated multidisciplinary squads on e-commerce and data-driven platforms, scaling developer experience.
highlights: I rolled out a shared design system across six teams with progressive rollout and dedicated training.
I introduced end-to-end testing and real-time monitoring, reducing time-to-recovery by 35%.

roles.summary: I supported startups and SMEs on performance, accessibility, and digital product bootstrapping.
highlights: I launched React + Electron prototypes for internal tools delivering in just a few weeks.
I created full-stack TypeScript boilerplates reused by teams distributed across three time zones.
